verbs.description: [ARG0: army] [V: booted] out [ARG1: over 500 immigrant recruits] [ARGM-TMP: in a year over the course of 12 months] the u s army discharged more than 500 immigrant enlistees who were recruited across the globe for their language or medical skills and promised a fast track to citizenship in exchange for their service the associated press has found pakistan mavni ap u s district court san francisco panshu zhao carla gleason pentagon brazil army mongolia the associated press minnesota state university badamsereejid gansukh texas iran recruits u s jessica maxwell margaret stock jim mattis china united states department of defense defense department us army and army national guard mendoza united states army u s army and army national guard u s army district of columbia burke congressman
